instructions: Tap Browse at the bottom of the screen, then tap an item on the Browse screen. If you don t see the Browse screen, tap Browse again. To open a file, location, or folder, tap it. Note: If you haven t installed the app that created a file, a preview of the file opens in Quick Look.
From an open location or folder, drag down from the center of the screen. Tap Sorted by, then choose an option: Name, Date, Size, Kind, or Tags.

Reply LongIslandDave December 25, 2019 at 8:45 pm Did you know you can swap the images around on the video chat? When you start video chat, your image is small in the top right corner, and the other party is on the main screen, full screen. To swap the images - say you want to see more clearly the piece of paper you are showing them - simply tap on the small image, and the 2 images will swap. Tap it again to swap back.
